name: Avatar Configuration
description: Static avatar configuration - sets VRM model, idle animation, and renderer type

model_url.label: Model URL/Path
model_url.description: URL or path to VRM model file

vtube_port.label: VTube Studio Port
vtube_port.description: Port for VTube Studio API connection

vtube_mouth_param.label: VTS Mouth Parameter
vtube_mouth_param.description: VTube Studio parameter ID for mouth control (e.g., MouthOpen, MouthOpenY)

vtube_expression_map.label: VTS Expression Hotkey Map (JSON)
vtube_expression_map.description: Map expressions to VTube Studio hotkey IDs. Format: {"happy": "HotkeyID", ...}

idle_animation.label: Idle Animation URL
idle_animation.description: Path to idle animation file (Mixamo FBX)
